title: Understanding sexuality (with booklet)
brief_description: An educational video with accompanying booklet featuring Professor Derek Llewellyn-Jones, professor of obstetrics and gynaecology at the University of Sydney discussing subjects such as sexuality, puberty, menstruation, sexual behaviour, contraception, pregnancy and abortion, sexual diseases and sexual responsibility with a group of adolescents.
